title: HyraxMetadataUpdateConfig
description: Describes the config used by the hyrax-metadata-update task

bucket.description: the bucket the has the private/public key needed for decrypting cmr password

buckets.description: aws s3 buckets used by this task

\\S*.description: bucket configuration for the key'd bucket

type.description: the type of bucket - i.e. internal, public, private, protected

duplicateHandling.description: Specifies how duplicate filenames should be handled. `error` will throw an error that, if not caught, will fail the task/workflow execution. `version` will add a suffix to the existing filename to avoid a clash.

environment.description: The Hyrax environment you wish to interact with. If not present, then `prod` is assumed

entryTitle.description: The CMR entry title for this collection

provider.description: The CMR provider ID associated with this archive
